short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay focused, organized, and productive from the moment you open a new tab with BrainForge.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗕𝗼𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝘃𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗙𝗼𝗿𝗴𝗲

Tired of opening a new tab only to fall into a social media vortex? BrainForge replaces your empty tab, transforming it into a distraction-free zone designed to supercharge your focus.

𝗦𝘁𝗮𝘆 𝗟𝗮𝘀𝗲𝗿-𝗙𝗼𝗰𝘂𝘀𝗲𝗱:

𝗣𝗼𝗺𝗼𝗱𝗼𝗿𝗼 𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿: Utilize the built-in 25-minute focus timer with 5-minute breaks, scientifically proven to enhance concentration and beat procrastination.
𝗗𝗮𝗶𝗹𝘆 𝗧𝗮𝘀𝗸𝘀 𝗮𝘁 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗙𝗶𝗻𝗴𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗽𝘀: Manage up to 6 daily tasks, keeping your goals organized and within reach.
𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘀: Mark completed tasks with a satisfying checkbox, staying motivated and accountable throughout the day.

𝗠𝗼𝗿𝗲 𝗧𝗵𝗮𝗻 𝗝𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗮 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲𝗿:

𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝘁-𝗶𝗻 𝗥𝗼𝘂𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗲 𝗚𝘂𝗶𝗱𝗲: Get inspired by a pre-defined list of suggestions for maintaining productivity, mental well-being, and physical health.
𝗘𝗻𝗱-𝗼𝗳-𝗦𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗥𝗲𝗳𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: Reflect on your day with a simple prompt. Feel accomplished? Celebrate with a burst of confetti!

𝗘𝗳𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗹𝘆 𝗣𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘁:

𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗙𝗼𝗿𝗴𝗲 integrates with 𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗮𝗹𝗦𝘁𝗼𝗿𝗮𝗴𝗲 of your browser, so you never lose track of your progress, even if you accidentally close your tab.  And to keep you focused on the day ahead, your tasks automatically reset at midnight.

Install 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻𝗙𝗼𝗿𝗴𝗲 today and transform your empty tab into a productivity powerhouse!
